name: Wesley David
description: I am smart, fun, affectionate, God fearing, and i love to try new things, You found me. Here I am, just testing the waters to see who is out there. I really enjoy meeting people in the real world but am giving online a try. I’d like to find that beautiful type of relationship where life can be shared on a deeper level. I’m looking for someone who is ready to share her live with me with open mind and a lovely heart. Relationships require effort by each partner. Good communication is vital for me and the willingness to make certain compromises to better the relationship. I’m excited to meet some new people and see from there.
